articles.description: A Starbucks union drive is sweeping across the country. In an industry that has been all but impossible to unionize, these baristas have created an organizing model that can be replicated at similar corporate chains everywhere.
articles.content: The Starbucks Workers United campaign, having secured National Labor Relations Board (NLRB) election victories at six out of seven stores, with well over 150 stores filing for an NLRB election as of … [+9534 chars]

articles.author: Nikhilesh De
articles.title: US Lawmakers Introduce 'ECASH' Bill in New Push to Create a Digital Dollar - CoinDesk
articles.description: The e-cash would be a digital analogue to the greenback and could preserve privacy and anonymous transactions, according to an adviser on the bill.
articles.content: The electronic dollar, as defined in the bill, would be a bearer instrument that people could hold on their phone or a card. The system would be token-based, not account-based, meaning if someone wer… [+130 chars]
